==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=西宫}}

===Etymology===
The Western Palace was also known as the Taiji Palace (太極宮), and was located to the northwest of the capital at [[w:Chang'an|Chang'an]]. The Western Palace was one of several alternate palaces near the capital.
